price: enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of the Blazing Fire.
arabic: فَٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ وَوَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
